abstract: For two decades, Carl C. Icahn has been among the most visible of rabble-rousing investors, garnering attention from the press for nearly every investment he makes. From TWA to Time Warner, he has been unafraid to step into the spotlight and attack companies, and sometimes take them over, in an attempt to shake them up.
lead_paragraph: For two decades, Carl C. Icahn has been among the most visible of rabble-rousing investors, garnering attention from the press for nearly every investment he makes. From TWA to Time Warner, he has been unafraid to step into the spotlight and attack companies, and sometimes take them over, in an attempt to shake them up.
